english.segment1: And the future's robbing my soul. I'm face to face with my futility. And my life is slipping away. Inhaling my mortality
english.segment2: I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. I'm just a blinking light. I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. And I'm about to evaporate. I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. I'm just a blinking light. I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. I'm a vapor
english.segment3: And I feel my skin's just a shell. Underneath is my reality. I breathe dimensions unknown. It conquers my mortality
english.segment4: I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. I'm just a blinking light. I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. And I'm about to evaporate. I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. I'm just a blinking light. I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. I'm a vapor
english.segment5: It's a mad world will it ever stop?. Will the madness end?. While my body decays my soul does not. Death is just the beginning. And the future is robbing my soul. Inhaling my mortality
english.segment6: I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. I'm just a blinking light. I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. And I'm about to evaporate. I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. I'm just a blinking light. I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. I'm a vapor
english.segment7: I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. I'm just a blinking light. I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. And I'm about to evaporate. I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. I'm just a blinking light. I'm a beep, I'm a vapor. I'm a vapor
